I have Loved Lady and the Tramp since I was a child. I am in the process of collecting all my childhood Disney Animated movies on HD, I was a little concerned by the comments on how some of the BD's did not play on some folks players, for a few different reasons. I decided to buy them anyway...if some didn't play I could always return them. Which I would have hated to do. Well, my Luck, ALL the BD's I bought PLAYED!! YAY!! On my VIZIO HD player. I am so Happy. The picture and sound were great. No problems. I also loved Lady & the Tramp II. I had never seen it before. I LOVE DISNEY movies.
Worked just fine on my Blue Ray Player!
Perfect product great movie

Our granddaughters love, love, love this movie, just as their mom did over 20 years ago, It was a plus with #2 as well, I have never seen that one, it was lots of fun watching this with my girls abour four times now!  Great classic for your disney collection!
Grandson loves it.

Looked for several years for this video but found none locally  this was a birthday gift for my handicapped daughter finding it here was wonderful thanks you made our day
So awesome!
a

Wonderful edition of a beloved Disney classic. Attention has been given to every detail, using the latest technology to remaster this lovely film, originally released in 1955. I love this particular item because it brings two movies. "Lady and the Tramp" and "Lady and the Tramp 2 Scamp's Adventure" when you account for that, it is very reasonably priced. Shipping was very fast, and the product was just as described. I saw the first movie (my son absolutely loved it, and has watched it repeatedly) I have yet to watched the second one, but plant to watch it soon, God willing. Excellent purchase!
Favorite movie just wanted a new version of both and I got the best of both worlds with the two.
Came a littler earlier. Movie looks fine and the picture looks great

When I saw that amazon had lady in the Tramp my favorite love story that Disney has I was stoked. Not only did they have lady in the Tramp but it came in a bundle with Lady and the Tramp 2 which I could not find anywhere in stores.this 2 movie collection Blu-ray is one of the best dvds ive bought. I definitely save the money buying the two movie collection deal the pictures are clear sound is great comes with two separate Blu-ray DVDs so it is not packed on one disc. This deals worked great for me.
